option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: watchexec -r -e md,html,scss,css,js,yml,png,jpg,jpeg,yaml,rb --ignore 'languages/**' --ignore 'assets/img/gallery/**' --ignore '_data/galleries/**' --ignore '_config_languages.yml' -- sh -c "bundle exec jekyll clean && ruby generate_language_pages.rb && ruby generate_language_map.rb && ruby gallery_generator.rb && bundle exec jekyll serve"
